org.apache.streams.twitter.api

Interface WelcomeMessageRules

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Twitter

    @Remoteable(path="https://api.twitter.com/1.1/direct_messages/welcome_messages/rules")
public interface WelcomeMessageRules
    Interface for /direct_messages/welcome_messages/rules methods.
    See Also:
    https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroyWelcomeMessageRule(Long id)
      Deletes a Welcome Message Rule by the given id.
      WelcomeMessageRulesListResponse listWelcomeMessageRules(WelcomeMessageRulesListRequest parameters)
      Returns a list of Welcome Message Rules.
      WelcomeMessageRule newWelcomeMessageRule(WelcomeMessageNewRuleRequest body)
      Creates a new Welcome Message Rule that determines which Welcome Message will be shown in a given conversation.
      WelcomeMessageRule showWelcomeMessageRule(Long id)
      Returns a Welcome Message Rule by the given id.

              path="/list.json")

        Returns a list of Welcome Message Rules.

        See Also:

        See Also:

      • newWelcomeMessageRule

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="POST",
              path="/new.json")
WelcomeMessageRule newWelcomeMessageRule(@Body
                                                                                                          WelcomeMessageNewRuleRequest body)
        Creates a new Welcome Message Rule that determines which Welcome Message will be shown in a given conversation. Returns the created rule if successful. Requires a JSON POST body and Content-Type header to be set to application/json. Setting Content-Length may also be required if it is not automatically. Additional rule configurations are forthcoming. For the initial beta release, the most recently created Rule will always take precedence, and the assigned Welcome Message will be displayed in the conversation.
        Returns:
        WelcomeMessageRule
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/direct-messages/welcome-messages/api-reference/new-welcome-message-rule

      • destroyWelcomeMessageRule

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="DELETE",
              path="/destroy.json")
void destroyWelcomeMessageRule(@Query(value="id")
                                                                                                      Long id)
        Deletes a Welcome Message Rule by the given id.
        See Also:
        https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/direct-messages/welcome-messages/api-reference/delete-welcome-message-rule
